title: Drawing, "Children Serving Tea to Dolls", ca. 1944
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, on mobile canteen: YMCA Tea Car No. 49 Serving H.M. Forces.
description: Back view of large mobile canteen. Lower half, three small girls giving their dolls afternoon tea.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Children Serving Tea to Dolls", ca. 1944.
ca. 1944. Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-11.
